title: I need a similar font to this
content:
A designer created this for us but gave us bad font files. It's called "Roscent" so I don't know if it exists out there, but what I need is something really similar. Of course if it does exist out there that would be ideal.

Any ideas?

I tried WhatsMyFont and Identifont. didn't work.

many thanks,  
Justin
